mapper.sql: id, attachment_source, address, remarks, name, number, people, department, assign, completeDate, solve, state, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted,countryside_id,hidden_type
mapper.insert: insert into hidden_danger ( id, attachment_source, address, remarks, name, number, people, department, assign, completeDate, solve, state, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{solve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update: update hidden_danger set isdeleted = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hidden_danger set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countryside_id = #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hidden_type = #{hiddenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into hidden_danger (attachment_source, address, remarks, name, number, people, state, x, y, yhzh, createId, createTime, isdeleted, countryside_id,hidden_type) values (#{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{people,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countrysideId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hiddenType,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select id, x, y from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0' group by id
select people,count(id) as count from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0' group by people

select
from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0'
and state like concat('%', #{page.state}, '%')
select count(id) as count,QUARTER(createTime) as quarter from hidden_danger where YEAR(createTime) = #{year} and isdeleted = '0' GROUP BY QUARTER(createTime)
select count(id) from hidden_danger where state = #{state}
select a.state,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from hidden_danger_state as a left join( select state,count(id) as count from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0' group by state) as b on a.state = b.state
select count(id) as count,MONTH(createTime) as month from hidden_danger where YEAR(createTime) = #{year} and isdeleted = '0' GROUP BY MONTH(createTime)
select count(id) as count,DAYNAME(createTime) as dayName from hidden_danger where YEAR(createTime) = #{year} and isdeleted = '0' GROUP BY DAYNAME(createTime)

select cl.countryside_name as type,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from countrysideList cl left join(select countryside_id,count(id) as count from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0' group by countryside_id) as b on b.countryside_id = cl.id
select hidden_type as type,sum(case when state=#{state} then 1 else 0 end ) as count from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0' group by hidden_type
select people as type,sum(case when state=#{state} then 1 else 0 end ) as count from hidden_danger where isdeleted = '0' group by people

SELECT hidden_danger_type.hidden_type as type, sum(case when state=#{state} then 1 else 0 end ) as count FROM `hidden_danger_type` LEFT JOIN hidden_danger on hidden_danger_type.hidden_type=hidden_danger.hidden_type GROUP BY hidden_danger_type.hidden_type
